KAPPC basketball delegation back here
     Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The basketball delegation of the Korean Asia-Pacific Peace Committee (KAPPC) led by vice-chairman Song Ho Gyong came back here this afternoon after participating in the "basketball game for reunification" at the invitation of the Hyundai Business Group of South Korea.
